property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash If an opponent would draw two or more cards, instead you and that player each draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no justice when some profit and others go without."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Balan, Wandering Knight has double strike as long as two or more Equipment are attached to it. {1}{W}: Attach all Equipment you control to Balan.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What weapon will you bear against one who's mastered them all?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you gain 2 life. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Good health beckons many a vigorous follower.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a nonland permanent you don't control, then each other player chooses a nonland permanent they don't control that hasn't been chosen this way. Destroy all other nonland permanents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Kindred Boon enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {1}{W}: Put a divinity counter on target creature you control of the chosen type. Each creature you control with a divinity counter on it has indestructible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, destroy target nonland permanent that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The justice of dragons demands more than just an eye for an eye.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Stalking Leonin enters the battlefield, secretly choose an opponent. Reveal the player you chose: Exile target creature that's attacking you if it's controlled by the chosen player. Activate only once.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.) Exile Teferi's Protection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you draw a card. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Idle chatter beckons many an attentive ear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ground bones, broken glass, and splintered shipwrecks make up the sands of his shores.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few things are truly "lost" at sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Mind: Shuffle your library, then exile the top X cards, where X is one plus the number of spells cast this turn. Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll show you what you truly desire."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Portal Mage enters the battlefield during the declare attackers step, you may reselect which player or permanent target attacking creature is attacking. (It can't attack its controller or their permanents.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink When Bloodline Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may return target Vampire or Wizard creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The veil of death hides little from our kind."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control dies while Boneyard Scourge is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return Boneyard Scourge from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death arrives on tattered wings and stolen bones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sounds of life beckon many a restless soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Whenever Kheru Mind-Eater deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles a card from their hand face down. You may look at cards exiled with Kheru Mind-Eater, and you may play lands and cast spells from among those cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of the chosen type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the end, the lights fade, the land withers, and only the dead and vile remain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped Vampire you control. Gain control of target creature. Change the text of that creature by replacing all instances of one creature type with Vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Patron of the Vein enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it and put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vindictive Lich dies, choose one or more. Each mode must target a different player. • Target opponent sacrifices a creature. • Target opponent discards two cards. • Target opponent loses 5 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My liege will lead and I will follow - to the battlefield, to the grave, and beyond."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of each player's end step, Crimson Honor Guard deals 4 damage to that player unless they control a commander.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The finest soldiers aren't worth a whit without a set of hands to lead them and a set of eyes to guide them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a Gold token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same. (A Gold token is an artifact with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jingling coins beckon many an eager hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {R}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature type. For each creature you control of the chosen type, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste and "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and attach Shifting Shadow to it, then put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent at random that Territorial Hellkite didn't attack during your last combat. Territorial Hellkite attacks that player this combat if able. If you can't choose an opponent this way, tap Territorial Hellkite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, untap all nonland permanents you control. Each opponent attacking that player untaps all nonland permanents they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flavorful aromas beckon many a salivating maw.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cats you control have protection from Rats. (They can't be blocked, targeted, or dealt damage by Rats.) At the beginning of your end step, target opponent creates a 1/1 black Rat creature token with deathtouch. Whenever a Rat dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each Cat you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature type. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X creature cards of the chosen type, where X is the number of creatures you control of that type. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Whenever Qasali Slingers or another Cat enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All things will crumble, whether by time or by force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With such great footsteps, everything is within walking distance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eminence - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Arahbo, Roar of the World is in the command zone or on the battlefield, another target Cat you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Whenever another Cat you control attacks, you may pay {1}{G}{W}. If you do, it gains trample and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eminence - Whenever you cast another Vampire spell, if Edgar Markov is in the command zone or on the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token. First strike, haste Whenever Edgar Markov attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nonland permanent. Each player other than its controller creates a token that's a copy of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Self-reflection is not without its perils.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eminence - Whenever another nontoken Wizard enters the battlefield under your control, if Inalla, Archmage Ritualist is in the command zone or on the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that Wizard. The token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Tap five untapped Wizards you control: Target player loses 7 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Loss has no meaning here. You cannot take from those who have nothing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each 1 life you gained this turn. First strike, lifelink Pay 5 life: Put three +1/+1 counters on Licia, Sanguine Tribune. Activate only during your turn and only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I give my blood, my life, all I have in exchange for victory."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mairsil, the Pretender enters the battlefield, you may exile an artifact or creature card from your hand or graveyard and put a cage counter on it. Mairsil, the Pretender has all activated abilities of all cards you own in exile with cage counters on them. You may activate each of those abilities only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace At the beginning of your end step, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. For as long as that creature has a bounty counter on it, it has "When this creature dies, each opponent draws a card and gains 2 life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat. As long as Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith enters the battlefield, search your library for an Equipment card and reveal it. If you reveal a card named Hammer of Nazahn this way, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle. Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, you may tap target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Whenever O-Kagachi, Vengeful Kami deals combat damage to a player, if that player attacked you during their last turn, exile target nonland permanent that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At his behest the Kami War began to regain That Which Was Taken.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant, sorcery, and Dragon spells you control can't be countered. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, if Taigam, Ojutai Master attacked this turn, that spell gains rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skip your draw step. At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. {B}, {T}, Exile X cards from your graveyard: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eminence - As long as The Ur-Dragon is in the command zone or on the battlefield, other Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Flying Whenever one or more Dragons you control attack, draw that many cards, then you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Whenever Wasitora, Nekoru Queen deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature. If the player can't, you create a 3/3 black, red, and green Cat Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a fierce foe, she would become one of Madara's greatest protectors.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: Spilled blood always begets more of the same.

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: As Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast. At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Mirror of the Forebears enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {1}: Until end of turn, Mirror of the Forebears becomes a copy of target creature you control of the chosen type, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ramos, Dragon Engine for each of that spell's colors. Remove five +1/+1 counters from Ramos: Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the time your knees have worn through your robe, you may have begun to learn your place."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now." - Alovnek, Boros guildmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses a creature they control. Destroy the rest. Flashback {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They had it coming." - Squire Imalia, savior of Thiswick

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Jareth, Leonine Titan blocks, it gets +7/+7 until end of turn. {W}: Jareth gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Light's champion in the stronghold of darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike {3}{W}{W}: Attacking creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As my kha, he is the source of my inspiration. As my brother, he is the embodiment of my aspirations." - Ajani Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't search libraries. Any player may pay {2} for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our people are torn by infighting. Until the two sides reconcile, our laws can carry no meaning."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Leonin Relic-Warder enters the battlefield, you may exile target artifact or enchantment. When Leonin Relic-Warder leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may activate equip abilities any time you could cast an instant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her instinct is as sharp as her blade.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Defender, flying When Orator of Ojutai enters the battlefield, if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance As long as Raksha Golden Cub is equipped, Cat creatures you control get +2/+2 and have double strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some believe that Raksha, youngest of the kha, is the reincarnation of Dakan, the first and mightiest of leonin leaders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "End this. What I seek is far greater." - Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Seht's Tiger enters the battlefield, you gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything of the chosen color.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thieves know that a snarl in the night means, "Rob another house."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Sunscorch Regent and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We trust in the scalelords, bringers of justice that none can escape." - Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Taj-Nar Swordsmith enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, search your library for an Equipment card with mana value X or less, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Battle of Liet Field, the white sun crested above Taj-Nar, bringing hope to all who survived the carnage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw three cards. {2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has journeyed where none have been before. Now he returns to ensure that none follow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Choices belong to those with the luxuries of time and distance. We have neither. I recommend we proceed with the plan to destroy all shrines of the kami." - Lady Azami, letter to Sensei Hisoka

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Body Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am who I pretend to be."

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each creature target player controls, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their lust for battle was so great that they didn't care their enemies wore their own faces.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Harbinger of the Tides as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) When Harbinger of the Tides enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Roil tide! Roil tide! Tie yourselves down!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or - if they get desperate enough - the truth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Monastery Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans - At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card, then discard a card. • Dragons - Spells your opponents cast that target you or a permanent you control cost {2} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, each creature target player controls loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The flies were bothering me." - Jalira, master polymorphist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature other than Serendib Sorcerer has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even a dragon is humble as a kitten if it thinks itself a slave."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard and target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. Copy those cards. Cast the copies if able without paying their mana costs. Exile Spelltwine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier." - Ob Nixilis

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player sacrifices a non-Vampire creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So many have died in search of that map. And now it appears in the hands of the arrogant child Chandra Nalaar."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Apprentice Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mage willing to dedicate his life to his craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on Black Market. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} for each charge counter on Black Market.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Great art can never be created without great suffering."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker - Tap an untapped Vampire you control. (You may tap a Vampire you control in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Target opponent loses half their life, rounded up. If this spell was kicked, you gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} any number of times as you cast this spell.) When Bloodhusk Ritualist enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card for each time it was kicked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying Whenever you cast a Vampire creature spell, it gains bloodthirst 3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1. Tap five untapped Vampires you control: Gain control of target creature. It becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Corpse Augur dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even when the flesh grows cold, knowledge waits in the bones for a master to release it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy all Dragon creatures. • Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ugin's whispered summons led Sarkhan Vol to the moment that would echo down the centuries and seal Tarkir's fate: the primal battle between Ugin and Nicol Bolas.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Silumgar's mind is a dark labyrinth, full of grim secrets and subtle traps." - Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{B}{B}: Exile target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on Dark Impostor. Dark Impostor has all activated abilities of all creature cards exiled with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ah, this is a nice life. I can see why you were so desperate to keep it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Deathbringer Regent enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way. Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {X}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -0/-X until end of turn and Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If our former masters would have us kneel again, they shall feel our defiance slashed across their membranes."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of their choice. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, protection from white When Malakir Bloodwitch enters the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to the number of Vampires you control. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile Necromantic Selection.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shambled from the cloud of ash and bone dust, undeterred by its own extinction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Converge - You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Eldrazi spread, no secret that could give Zendikar's defenders an advantage was considered too dangerous to seek.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Palace Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans - At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Dragons - At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Pawn of Ulamog or another nontoken creature you control dies, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Puppeteer Clique enters the battlefield, put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. At the beginning of your next end step, exile it. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may gain 3 life. Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blood is constant. Every drop I drink, someone must bleed." - Vradeen, vampire nocturnus

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile X cards from your graveyard. You draw X cards and you lose X life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Skeletal Vampire enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying. {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a Bat: Create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying. Sacrifice a Bat: Regenerate Skeletal Vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you're looking for it, it's available. The question is how much you're willing to pay.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As they fought the Eldrazi, many vampires learned to live among humans. Others were unable to make the adjustment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}, {T}: Vein Drinker deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Vein Drinker. Whenever a creature dealt damage by Vein Drinker this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Vein Drinker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Choose any target, then choose another target for each time this spell was kicked. Comet Storm deals X damage to each of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it." - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn. Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fell screaming into the depths of the chasm like so many pebbles tossed down a well.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Whenever Hellkite Charger attacks, you may pay {5}{R}{R}. If you do, untap all attacking creatures and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Outpost Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans - At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. • Dragons - Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, Outpost Siege deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you're not having fun, what's the point of living forever?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Ryusei, the Falling Star dies, it deals 5 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Scourge of Valkas or another Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control. {R}: Scourge of Valkas gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Lieutenant - As long as you control your commander, Tyrant's Familiar gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever Tyrant's Familiar attacks, it deals 7 damage to target creature defending player controls."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing escapes its gaze - or its breath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, create a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fear of dragons is as old and as powerful as the fear of death itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target creature with flying. • Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your veil's curse won't stop me, deathmage. I have taken down countless night hunters and this dark plane is not big enough for you to hide." - Garruk Wildspeaker, to Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I want to help Zendikar. Show me the way." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Frontier Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans - At the beginning of each of your main phases, add {G}{G}. • Dragons - Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To be counted among the warriors of Setessa's Leina Tower, you must not fear death, only failure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) Whenever Jedit Ojanen of Efrava attacks or blocks, create a 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature token with forestwalk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cat warriors recognized this Jedit's face, but not his fierce loyalty to Efrava.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land grows only where the kami will it." - Dosan the Falling Leaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, search your library for up to three basic Forest cards instead of two.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or more - • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the forests became havens for evil, the archmages devised new ways to cleanse the wilds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment and up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are many ruins, but there used to be many more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the power of target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An avatar he sculpts of wisdom and strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: You may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Temur Sabertooth gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Temur see themselves as a pack, their bonds more primal than the Abzan's.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced. (The types of mana are white, blue, black, red, green, and colorless.) Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her hunger knows no limit. Left unchecked, she would feast on all of Tarkir." - Yasova Dragonclaw

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who worship the great gargantuans could hardly be expected to fight with a subtle weapon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Bladewing the Risen enters the battlefield, you may return target Dragon permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {B}{R}: Dragon creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink, protection from white and from black As long as you have 30 or more life and an opponent has 10 or less life, Blood Baron of Vizkopa gets +6/+6 and has flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Broodmate Dragon enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Frozen in fear, the goblins stared upward at the circling hunter - and were promptly eaten by its diving mate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during combat. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crackling Doom deals 2 damage to each opponent. Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Do not fear the lightning. Fear the one it obeys.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Crosis, the Purger deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, choose a color, then that player reveals their hand and discards all cards of that color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. • Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bane of countless shattered weapons, each a failure to slay her." - Daghatar the Adamant

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}{R}: Return Etherium-Horn Sorcerer to its owner's hand. Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}{W}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Fleecemane Lion is monstrous, it has hexproof and indestructible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: You may cast target creature card in a graveyard this turn. When you cast it this turn, Havengul Lich gains all activated abilities of that card until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fusing intelligence with the power of undeath requires inspiration of the darkest kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Intet, the Dreamer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at that card for as long as it remains exiled. You may play that card without paying its mana cost for as long as Intet remains on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Izzet Chronarch enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He ensures not only whether but also when and where the lightning strikes twice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Dash {3}{B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Other creatures you control have dethrone. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Vengeance is the echo of the victim's own crime." - Grensch, merrow cutthroat

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Exile all artifacts. • Exile all creatures. • Exile all enchantments. • Exile all planeswalkers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}: Draw two cards. {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Mercurial Chemister deals damage to target creature equal to the discarded card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What some see as "distracted" is really "fathoming the unfathomable."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land drank power from the Mirari as though it had thirsted forever.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many who cross Sorin's path come down with a sudden and fatal case of being-in-the-way-of-a-millennia-old-vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}{U}{R}, {T}: Nin, the Pain Artist deals X damage to target creature. That creature's controller draws X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your body is a delicate instrument that tells me truths. These devices help me ‘tune' that instrument."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals damage to a player, you may draw a card. {U}{R}: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has no patience for minds that do not inspire him or explode by trying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to any target. {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {2}{U}{R}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The only action worth taking is one with an unknown outcome."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, tap target nonland permanent an opponent controls. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I battled Ojutai, I realized my learning had only begun." - Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Phantom Nishoba enters the battlefield with seven +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Phantom Nishoba deals damage, you gain that much life. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nishoba, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nishoba.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An elder in one pride, of the Sigiled caste in another.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Exile target player's graveyard. • Destroy target artifact. • Each creature deals 1 damage to its controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Savage Ventmaw attacks, add {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it into your graveyard. If you do, Scion of the Ur-Dragon becomes a copy of that card until end of turn. Then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the blood of the ur-dragon, coursing through all dragonkind."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, hexproof Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, creatures defending player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No machinations, no puppet strings, no plots. Just pure, sweeping death." - Tasigur, the Golden Fang

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Counter target noncreature spell. • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. • Destroy target planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Spellbound Dragon attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. Spellbound Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A king in Jund, a serf in Esper.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1 and have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No longer can we allow our human populations to be mindlessly slaughtered by ghouls. Slay all who trespass." - Runo Stromkirk

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Teneb, the Harvester deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Other creatures you control have intimidate. Whenever Vela the Night-Clad or another creature you control leaves the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: Mirrodin's creator still lives, still shapes metal, and still commands world-shaking power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages - until now.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. If equipped creature is a Vampire, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead. Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size - a weight of strength and of pride." - Agrus Kos

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.) {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It reflects the purity of Mirrodin-that-was." - Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Door of Destinies enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, put a charge counter on Door of Destinies. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1 for each charge counter on Door of Destinies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do you have that I cannot obtain?" - Mairsil, the Pretender

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells you cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is all in my grasp. Every petty dream, every grand scheme, every soul, every fear. It all flows through me and from me." - Memnarch

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: Part tool, part weapon, part of the kor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've begun to understand the hedrons' true purpose," said Ugin. "The Eldrazi can be imprisoned." "And how did that work out last time?" asked Jace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +3/+2. Whenever a legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Hero's Blade to it. Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best swords are forged with dragonfire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {0}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A crafter must imbue her weapon with part of her soul - something the Phyrexians are incapable of doing." - Melira, sylvok outcast

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nevinyrral's Disk enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile target player's graveyard. When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: The mind is a beautiful bounty encased in an annoying bone container.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card. {T}: Staff of Nin deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have attuned the staff to your screams so that only I may benefit from your pain." - Volux, disciple of Nin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is great wisdom in rushing headlong into combat . . . if you're prepared." - Kenjek, captain of the Thousand Swords

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: The blade glows only for Zendikar's chosen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike, vigilance, trample, and haste. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When wielded by a true believer, it matters little whether the sword is a relic or a replica.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Unstable Obelisk: Destroy target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its collapse is like the lashing out of a long-dead civilization that resents being forgotten.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say the knowledge lost during the Ritual of Rebuking is returned through the well's waters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even a fragment of a powerstone contains within it not just energy, but space - vast dimensions trapped in fragile crystal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must rely on our own knowledge, not on the dogma of the seekers or the mutterings of the sphinxes." - Tullus of Palandius

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Woodland: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped. When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped. When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mudflow swallowed the lowlands years ago. All that remains are a bottomless mire and an endless rain of ash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living." - Olcot, Rider of Joffik

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Llanowar has seven elfhames, or kingdoms, each with its own ruler. Their palaces are objects of awe, wonder, and envy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them." - Pulan, Bant orchardist

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Prayers will curdle on the tongue and be heard by rotting ears." - Minaldra, the Vizag Atum

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most powerful dreams visit those who shelter in a dragon's skull." - Chianul, Who Whispers Twice

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When asked how many paths reach enlightenment, the monk kicked a heap of sand. "Count," he smiled, "and then find more grains."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the weak imprison themselves behind walls. We live free under the wind, and our freedom makes us strong." - Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.
